name: Planet Namek
desc: Planet Namek is home to the Namekians the creators of the Dragon Balls and the home world of Piccolo. Namek has 3 suns so there is no night.
fights: Gohan and Krillin vs. Banan and Sui
Raspberry and Blueberry vs. Giant Crab
Captain Ginyu (Goku's body) vs. Gohan and Krillin
Gohan, Krillin and Goku (Captain Ginyu's body) vs. Captain Ginyu (Goku's body)
Vegeta, Gohan and Krillin vs. Frieza (First Form)
Gohan, Vegeta, and Krillin vs. Frieza (Second Form)
Gohan, Krillin, Piccolo vs. Frieza (Final Form)

name: World Tournament Stage
desc:
The World Martial Arts Tournament is a Martial Arts fighting tournament that happens on May 7 every few years on Papaya Island. The tournament features some of the Earth's strongest fighters from all over the globe.
  • 21st - Date: Age 750 - Winner: Jackie Chun
  • 22nd - Date: Age 753 - Winner: Tien Shinhan
  • 23rd - Date: Age 756 - Winner: Goku
  • 24th - Date: Age 767 - Winners: Videl & Hercule
  • 25th - Date: Age 774 - Winners: Trunks & Hercule
fights: Hercule vs. 18 vs. Mighty Mask (Goten & Trunks) vs. Killa vs Jewel

name: World Tournament Stage [Ringout]
desc:
The World Martial Arts Tournament is a Martial Arts fighting tournament that happens on May 7 every few years on Papaya Island. The tournament features some of the Earth's strongest fighters from all over the globe.
  • 21st - Date: Age 750 - Winner: Jackie Chun
  • 22nd - Date: Age 753 - Winner: Tien Shinhan
  • 23rd - Date: Age 756 - Winner: Goku
  • 24th - Date: Age 767 - Winners: Videl & Hercule
  • 25th - Date: Age 774 - Winners: Trunks & Hercule
special_desc:
Special Features of this background include
  • Ready... Fight! starting
  • Lively Crowd
  • 3D effect during camera panning (particularly on the stairs)
  • Fully voiced and dynamic play by play announcer
  • Ringout feature allowing you to knock out enemies by hitting them out of bounds
fights: Hercule vs. 18 vs. Mighty Mask (Goten & Trunks) vs. Killa vs Jewel

name: Time Chamber
desc: The Hyperbolic Time Chamber (or Room of Spirit and Time) is a special dimension where 1 year inside is equivalent to 1 day on Earth. The temperature varies from 50째C to -40째C. The air is 1/4 of Earths while the gravity is 10 times greater than Earth.

name: Time Chamber [Hazards]
desc: The Hyperbolic Time Chamber (or Room of Spirit and Time) is a special dimension where 1 year inside is equivalent to 1 day on Earth. The temperature varies from 50째C to -40째C. The air is 1/4 of Earths while the gravity is 10 times greater than Earth.
special_desc:
The special feature of this background is that it runs on a 1 minute cycle.
15 seconds of normal
15 seconds of ice
15 seconds of normal
15 seconds of fire
